meta.title: Avalon Encino - Apartments in Los Angeles, CA | AvalonBay Communities | AvalonBay Communities

meta.name: title
meta.content: Avalon Encino - Apartments in Los Angeles, CA | AvalonBay Communities

div.span: We believe that elevating where you choose to live is about blending it seamlessly with how you want to live. We go to great lengths designing amenities and choosing locations that put everything within reach. Where you live, is where you come alive. Situated at the northern slope of the Santa Monica Mountains, our luxurious Avalon Encino apartments offer a piece of Los Angeles to call your own. Enjoy brand new one-, two- or three-bedroom luxury Encino apartments that have Contemporary and Urban Style flats for rent with fully-equipped gourmet kitchens featuring granite counter tops, breakfast bars and maple finish cabinetry. Plus, our technology package, AvalonConnect, offers pre-installed high-speed and community-wide WiFi, the ability to submit maintenance requests and pay your rent online, Amazon Hub package lockers, and more. Upgrade any home to Furnished+ and enjoy the convenience of turnkey living. Take advantage of the relaxed lifestyle with amazing apartment amenities that will allow you to relax in our sparkling outdoor pool, lounge around the outdoor fireplace, or enjoy a heart-pumping workout in the state-of-the-art fitness center. The beauty and splendor go beyond with lush courtyards, rooftop deck and wireless internet lounge that only add to the growing appeal of this amazing greater Los Angeles apartment community. ENCINO APARTMENTS BY AVALON Our apartments in Encino are a private haven of peace and security situated at the very heart of the city. You have easy access to wonderful shopping, dining and entertainment venues. The trio of Groves Overlook, San Vincente Mountain and Westridge-Canyonback Wilderness Parks all offer an escape from city life while golf courses, tennis courts, soccer fields and bicycle paths are all nearby to keep an active lifestyle. Members can also explore the Los Encinos State Historic Park complete with a museum, historic buildings and picnic grounds. With its central location, these Encino apartments put the beautiful beaches of Santa Monica and Malibu and the landmarks of Hollywood and Los Angeles within reach. You will never experience a dull moment with the greater Los Angeles area at your fingertips. ENCINO APARTMENT COMMUNITY As a member of our Encino apartments, you are also privileged to enjoy the benefits of what we refer to as the Avalon Advantage. This specially created program assures all members a sense of security and a convenient lifestyle. You can enjoy advantages such as a 30-day move-in guarantee, a maintenance response guarantee and a national relocation program. Avalon also works individually with you to customize renting terms that meet your needs. The apartments for rent in Encino form an ideal Avalon community and are the perfect place to set up your new home. So, don’t wait any longer. Click the Contact Us button below to schedule an appointment with us and discover the best apartments for rent in Encino today.

div.h2: The service. The standards. The life.

a.div: Great service is one of the things we think about most. We start with selecting passionate people. Then we let them put that passion to work. Our people are a vital part of what shapes the character of each Avalon community.

We strive to align our standards with yours, delivering an experience that lives up to them. We know you've put a lot into getting to where you are in life. We believe where you live should reflect that. So we put ourselves into making sure it does.

Effortless. Enjoyable. Truly comfortable living is both. That's why we go out of our way to choose locations and to design amenities that put so much within reach. So you can live easy without even trying.

div.div: Room dimensions, square footage, and features shown on the floor plan drawings are approximate and may vary between individual apartments that have similar layouts. Furniture shown on the floor plan drawings is representative and individual apartments come unfurnished unless specified otherwise. Quoted rent is per month for new move-ins to the community, based on the move-in date selected. Pricing may vary based on lease term. Quoted rent does not including other fees and charges that may be part of your lease (i.e. utilities, parking, etc.). Please contact the community for details. Prior to signing a lease, quoted rent, specials, availability, and other terms and conditions are subject to change without notice. Washington State - We require our own screening and do not accept comprehensive reusable tenant screening reports.

div.p: Curious about the community layout? You can download the community site map here.

div.h2: Only the best for your best life

Live Up."},"displayProperties":{},"localEdits":{},"variants":{}}}]},{"collection":"features","type":"CORE_CommunityDetailPage/CommunityDescription","props":{"collection":"features","type":"CORE_CommunityDetailPage/CommunityDescription","id":"f0fun9ZSQeIn7jM","contentConfig":{"contentService":"","contentConfigValues":{},"inherit":true},"customFields":{"title":"Make Yourself at Home","description":"We believe that elevating where you choose to live is about blending it seamlessly with how you want to live. We go to great lengths designing amenities and choosing locations that put everything within reach. Where you live, is where you come alive. Situated at the northern slope of the Santa Monica Mountains, our luxurious Avalon Encino apartments offer a piece of Los Angeles to call your own. Enjoy brand new one-, two- or three-bedroom luxury Encino apartments that have Contemporary and Urban Style flats for rent with fully-equipped gourmet kitchens featuring granite counter tops, breakfast bars and maple finish cabinetry. Plus, our technology package, AvalonConnect, offers pre-installed high-speed and community-wide WiFi, the ability to submit maintenance requests and pay your rent online, Amazon Hub package lockers, and more. Upgrade any home to Furnished+ and enjoy the convenience of turnkey living. Take advantage of the relaxed lifestyle with amazing apartment amenities that will allow you to relax in our sparkling outdoor pool, lounge around the outdoor fireplace, or enjoy a heart-pumping workout in the state-of-the-art fitness center. The beauty and splendor go beyond with lush courtyards, rooftop deck and wireless internet lounge that only add to the growing appeal of this amazing greater Los Angeles apartment community. ENCINO APARTMENTS BY AVALON Our apartments in Encino are a private haven of peace and security situated at the very heart of the city. You have easy access to wonderful shopping, dining and entertainment venues. The trio of Groves Overlook, San Vincente Mountain and Westridge-Canyonback Wilderness Parks all offer an escape from city life while golf courses, tennis courts, soccer fields and bicycle paths are all nearby to keep an active lifestyle. Members can also explore the Los Encinos State Historic Park complete with a museum, historic buildings and picnic grounds. With its central location, these Encino apartments put the beautiful beaches of Santa Monica and Malibu and the landmarks of Hollywood and Los Angeles within reach. You will never experience a dull moment with the greater Los Angeles area at your fingertips. ENCINO APARTMENT COMMUNITY As a member of our Encino apartments, you are also privileged to enjoy the benefits of what we refer to as the Avalon Advantage. This specially created program assures all members a sense of security and a convenient lifestyle. You can enjoy advantages such as a 30-day move-in guarantee, a maintenance response guarantee and a national relocation program. Avalon also works individually with you to customize renting terms that meet your needs. The apartments for rent in Encino form an ideal Avalon community and are the perfect place to set up your new home. So, don’t wait any longer. Click the Contact Us button below to schedule an appointment with us and discover the best apartments for rent in Encino today.","previewWordCount":50},"displayProperties":{},"localEdits":{},"variants":{}}},{"collection":"features","type":"CORE_CommunityDetailPage/PricingOverview","props":{"collection":"features","type":"CORE_CommunityDetailPage/PricingOverview","id":"f0fKyXwWQeIn7D2","contentConfig":{"contentService":"","contentConfigValues":{},"inherit":true},"customFields":{"imgSrc":"https://cloudfront-us-east-1.images.arcpublishing.com/avalonbay/GXSAHEHZHFHK7KWYDH6Y5QPGIM.jpg","furnishedDescription":"Furnished+ offers all the essential items you need to move in plus conveniences like flexible lease terms, included utilities, and immediate access to highspeed Wi-Fi and cable TV."},"displayProperties":{},"localEdits":{},"variants":{}}},{"collection":"chains","type":"CORE_CommunityBrandCards","props":{"collection":"chains","type":"CORE_CommunityBrandCards","id":"c0fkAFA7ReIn73u","customFields":{"title":"The service.\nThe standards.\nThe life."},"displayProperties":{}},"children":[{"collection":"features","type":"CORE_CommunityDetailPage/CommunityBrandCard","props":{"collection":"features","type":"CORE_CommunityDetailPage/CommunityBrandCard","id":"f0fL1zEZQeIn7ms","contentConfig":{"contentService":"","contentConfigValues":{},"inherit":true},"customFields":{"title":"The Service","link":"/","description":"Great service is one of the things we think about most.
